New Records: Klay Thompson set a franchise record for the most 3-pointers made in his debut with the Dallas Mavericks
Key Match Events: Luka Doncic scored a game-high 28 points
Klay Thompson drained a key 3-pointer in the fourth quarter, drawing a viral reaction from Luka Doncic
Post-Match Reflections: Klay Thompson expressed his feelings of nervousness turning into happiness after making shots
The Dallas Mavericks are hopeful Klay Thompson can build on this performance throughout the season
